00012 #include <time.h>
00013 #include <stdlib.h>
00014 
00015 namespace stxxl
00016 {
00017         unsigned ran32State = time (NULL);
00018 
00019         struct random_number32
00020         {
00021                 inline unsigned operator () () const
00022                 {
00023                         return (ran32State = 1664525 * ran32State + 1013904223);
00024                 };
00025         };
00026         
00028         struct random_uniform_fast
00029         {
00030                 random_number32 rnd32;
00031                 inline double operator() () const
00032                 {
00033                         return ((double)rnd32() * (0.5 / 0x80000000));
00034                 }
00035         };
00036         
00038         
00040         struct random_uniform_slow
00041         {
00042                 inline double operator() () const
00043                 {
00044                         return drand48();
00045                 }
00046         };
00047         
00048         template <class UniformRGen_ = random_uniform_fast>
00049         struct random_number
00050         {
00051                 UniformRGen_ uniform;
00052                 inline unsigned operator () (int N) const
00053                 {
00054                         return ((unsigned)(uniform() * (N)));
00055                 };
00056         };
00057         
00058         struct random_number64
00059         {
00060                 random_uniform_slow uniform;
00061                 inline unsigned long long operator() () const
00062                 {
00063                         return static_cast<unsigned long long>(uniform()*(18446744073709551616.));
00064                 }
00065         };
00066         
00067 }
